name: hwmnbn-email-worker
description: Email routing worker for hwmnbn.me domain

scripts.init-db: wrangler d1 execute email_logs --command "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS email_logs (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, from_addr TEXT NOT NULL, to_addr TEXT NOT NULL, subject TEXT, action TEXT NOT NULL, status TEXT NOT NULL, created_at TEXT DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)"
